alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 11:48AM MST until November 09 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Yampa River Basin, Grand Valley and Debeque to Silt Corridor. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin
